title: Research Methodology in Agribusiness
description: Empirical application of the scientific method as it relates to the design and development of Senior Project. Research plan is developed. First quarter of Senior Project. 2 seminars.
prerequisites: Senior standing and AGB major; one of the following AGB 327, AGB 328, AGB 405, AGB 421, AGB 422, AGB 433, AGB 435; and one of the following AGB 406, AGB 410, AGB 427, or AGB 450
